## Checklist

- [ ] PR has a descriptive title and content.
- [ ] PR has one of the labels: documentation, bug, enhancement, feature, maintenance
- [ ] Checks are passing.
      Failing lint checks can be resolved with:
  - `pre-commit run --all-files`
  - `jlpm run lint`
